content.rendered:
Hello. This is the FOSS4G-Asia Seoul team.

We would like to introduce our Silver Sponsor, Skonec Entertainment. Skonec Entertainment is leveraging its global-leading expertise in virtual reality and immersive content development to create a variety
of content and services using 4th industrial revolution technologies such as 5G, VR, AR, and more.
We sincerely appreciate their sponsorship and ask for your keen interest in FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul.
